alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 6:07PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pima County through 645 PM MST... At 607 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Santa Rosa, or 26 miles northwest of Sells, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa, Covered Wells, Anegam, Palo Verde Stand, Ak Chin, Vaya Chin, Sil Nakya, San Luis - Sells District, Mountain Village, San Luis, Rincon and Santa Rosa School. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 78 and 100. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
